com.epeterso2.jabberwordy.serialization.puz
Class PUZContext

java.lang.Object
  com.epeterso2.jabberwordy.serialization.puz.PUZContext

public class PUZContext
extends java.lang.Object

A convenience context for reading elements of a PUZ image. An instance of this class is constructed with a PUZ byte-array image. This image is read by the getter methods of this class using the methods of the PUZUtil class.

Author:
Eric Peterson

getSolutionCell

public byte getSolutionCell(int col,
                            int row)
Get the solution for a specific cell in the PUZ image. Any rebus solutions for the cell will be ignored.

Parameters:
col - The column (starting at 0) of the desired cell
row - The row (starting at 0) of the desired cell
Returns:
The value of the solution cell

Returns:
True if scrambled, false if not

getSolution

public PUZSolution getSolution(int col,
                               int row)
Get the solution for a specific cell in the PUZ image. Any rebus solutions for the cell take precedence over the single-character solution.

Parameters:
col - The column (starting at 0) of the desired cell
row - The row (starting at 0) of the desired cell
Returns:
The value of the solution cell

                                       int row)

Parameters:
col - The column (starting at 0) of the desired cell
row - The row (starting at 0) of the desired cell
Returns:
The value of the solution cell

isBlock

public boolean isBlock(int col,
                       int row)
Determine if the cell at a specific location in the PUZ image is a block (black square) or not

Parameters:
col - The column (starting at 0) of the desired cell
row - The row (starting at 0) of the desired cell
Returns:
True if the cell is a block, false otherwise

getUnlockCode

public java.lang.String getUnlockCode()
Find the unlock code for the scrambled solution in the PUZ image. If the puzzle is not scrambled, return null. See PUZEncryption for details on the encryption scheme.

Returns:
The unlock code

unlockSolution

public void unlockSolution(java.lang.String string)
Unlock (unscramble) the solution in the PUZ image using the given unlock code. See PUZEncryption for details on the encryption scheme.

Parameters:
string - The unlock code to use.
